table_description: Retrieves settings for the specified account.

columns.name: display_language
columns.description: Specifies the language settings for the specified account.

columns.name: auto_forwarding
columns.description: Describes the auto-forwarding setting for the specified account.

columns.name: delegates
columns.description: A list of delegates for the specified account.

columns.name: imap
columns.description: Describes the IMAP setting for the specified account.

columns.name: pop
columns.description: Describes the POP settings for the specified account.

columns.name: vacation
columns.description: Describes the vacation responder settings for the specified account.
